articles.description: Tech companies like Meta and Epic Games insist it’s the future of the internet, but the metaverse has been around in the form of video games and virtual worlds for decades — and it’s not taking over our lives yet
articles.content:
What is the metaverse?
Good question. Metaverse is currently a major buzzword in the worlds of tech, business, and finance, and like all buzzwords its definition is fuzzy, contested, and shaped by t… [+12079 chars]

articles.title: Shiba Inu To Be Overtaken By Bitgert, Already Reached $500m Marketcap - Analytics Insight
articles.description: The Bitgert BRC20 blockchain is a game-changing chain because of its zero gas features and also the fastest speed. Here is more about Bitgert and how it is overtaking Shiba Inu.
articles.content: The Shiba Inu hype is dying slowly, and it is clear that investors are not giving it much attention. The fast-reducing number of transactions of the Shiba Inu is a sign that things are not good. The … [+2504 chars]
